item.title: Automating Windows 10 STIG Compliance with Powershell Script
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "Automation" , "Windows STIG Compliance" , "Powershell Scripting" , "Windows 10 Enterprise" , "Windows Updates" , "FISMA Compliance" , "Windows 10 Hardening" , "Cybersecurity" , "National Security Agency" , "Department of Defense" , "Microsoft Security Compliance Toolkit" , "Windows Defender Application Guard" , "Windows Defender Credential Guard" , "System Guard Secure Launch" , "Memory Integrity" , "Microsoft Office" , "Adobe Reader" , "Google Chrome" , "Mozilla Firefox" , "Oracle JRE"
item.description: Learn how to automate the STIGing process of Windows 10 systems with the Standalone Windows STIG Script, saving time and improving efficiency for securing standalone systems in enterprise environments.
